description:
Hey! My name is ODi Productions and I'm a professional Music Producer and Audio Engineer (read bio to learn more). This online course, in my humble opinion, is the ULTIMATE guide to home recording. Having been recording for close to 10 years now, I know exactly what beginner musicians need in order to get the sound that they're looking for.

So what makes this course different from any other?

First off, you're learning from a professional producer who has worked with a Platinum-selling artist, while other "instructors" are mostly hobbyists.

The videos in this course are high-quality and short and sweet. There's no need to watch 6 hours of boring videos in order to learn ALL of the proper fundamentals.

Aside from the videos, I'll be just a message or e-mail away to answer ANY and ALL of your individual questions. Think of me as your personal 1-on-1 coach for music recording :-)

This investment today will repay itself over and over again in your future. Guaranteed.

Let's start learning today!
title: Ultimate Guide to Home Recording: Start a Home Studio
